description:
Inspired by a trip to Iceland, Roark’s Nordsman has a timeless, comfortable warmth to it. This flannel is crafted from light, Fair Trade™ Sewn cotton that is lightly brushed for extra comfort.Hearty cotton flannel is warm and dries quickly.Reinforced elbows and shoulders add a little extra durability where it is needed most.Dual chest pockets keep small necessities close.Snap-down front placket with button details.Classic fit.

        Sustainability






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade
name: Roark Nordsman Light Woven Shirt - Men's
